list.name: Default
list.comment: Added the ability to execute Python/JavaScript from tags.

task.summary: Default task
Added repeater style tabs to Hackvertor. Create a charset category and added more tags in encode.
Added workspace.xml file
Updated class path
Renamed phpfuck tag to be family friendly for the burp store. Fixed non-alpha generation to use unicode escapes to prevent characters being mangled.
Updated dist
Added support for conversions within requests. Added convert button. Added random tag. Restructured code to build jmenu as well as buttons.
Updated gitignore
Updated group id in pom.xml

Added auto decoding of xor encryption Added auto decoding of rotN etc Detection of English like text using ngrams. Fixed content-length bug reported by Paul. Fixed layout issues with the help of Mike. Added jwt tokens decoding/encoding. Added single self closing tag support for tags without input. Added tool tips for tags. Added support for hex in arguments Added a bunch of hash algorithms
Added get xor key tag
Added ngams class and ngrams .txt files
Auto decoded hex in auto_decode instead of in xor_decrypt
Fixed index out of bounds issue when getting the code point for non-ascii text.
Changed percent difference for auto decoding

Auto generated encoding tags when auto decoded. Added convert tags menu option and auto decode and convert Default decrypt xor to key length of 3 Detected when keylength is not sent in xor decrypt Added some guessing when there is a small amount of ciphertext in xor decryption
Added version number for maven plugin

Added loads of charset tags to make it easier to convert to them. Added auto decode without decryption to avoid misidentifying encrypted data and produce better auto decoding. Changed auto decode and convert to use auto decoder without decryption. Added clipboard detection to auto decode and convert your clipboard when switching to the tab.

Upgraded vulnerable Apache commons compress. Added JWT none algo. Fixed tag menu to be sorted numerically and alpha and added scrollbars. Looked for existing HV tags in clipboard before deciding to decode automatically.
Added MenuScroller
Created MessageEditor tab. Fixed bug where autodecode_no_decrypt would decrypt rotN. Fixed bug where global instance of Hackvertor would interfere with other instances. Fixed payload processor bug.
Added the ability to execute Python/JavaScript from tags. Disabled by default for obvious reasons.
Caught exceptions when the output isn't set. Checked for NULL PTR.
I now hide the logo when in a message editor tab. The message editor now shows for responses.

MESSAGE.value: Added repeater style tabs to Hackvertor. Create a charset category and added more tags in encode.
Added workspace.xml file
Updated class path
Renamed phpfuck tag to be family friendly for the burp store. Fixed non-alpha generation to use unicode escapes to prevent characters being mangled.
Updated dist
Added support for conversions within requests. Added convert button. Added random tag. Restructured code to build jmenu as well as buttons.
Updated gitignore
Updated group id in pom.xml

Added auto decoding of xor encryption Added auto decoding of rotN etc Detection of English like text using ngrams. Fixed content-length bug reported by Paul. Fixed layout issues with the help of Mike. Added jwt tokens decoding/encoding. Added single self closing tag support for tags without input. Added tool tips for tags. Added support for hex in arguments Added a bunch of hash algorithms
Added get xor key tag
Added ngams class and .txt files
Added ngams class and ngrams .txt files
Auto decoded hex in auto_decode instead of in xor_decrypt
Fixed index out of bounds issue when getting the code point for non-ascii text.
Changed percent difference for auto decoding

Auto generated encoding tags when auto decoded. Added convert tags menu option and auto decode and convert Default decrypt xor to key length of 3 Detected when keylength is not sent in xor decrypt Added some guessing when there is a small amount of ciphertext in xor decryption
Added version number for maven plugin

Added loads of charset tags to make it easier to convert to them. Added auto decode without decryption to avoid misidentifying encrypted data and produce better auto decoding. Changed auto decode and convert to use auto decoder without decryption. Added clipboard detection to auto decode and convert your clipboard when switching to the tab.

Upgraded vulnerable Apache commons compress. Added JWT none algo. Fixed tag menu to be sorted numerically and alpha and added scrollbars. Looked for existing HV tags in clipboard before deciding to decode automatically.
Added MenuScroller
Created MessageEditor tab. Fixed bug where autodecode_no_decrypt would decrypt rotN. Fixed bug where global instance of Hackvertor would interfere with other instances. Fixed payload processor bug.
Added the ability to execute Python/JavaScript from tags. Disabled by default for obvious reasons.
Caught exceptions when the output isn't set. Checked for NULL PTR.
I now hide the logo when in a message editor tab. The message editor now shows for responses.
